id.description: The id of a form field.

label.description: Label displayed on top of the form field.

description.description: Description provided below the form field.

key.description: Binds the form field to a form variable. Can be a dot separated path.

readonly.description: Makes the form field read only.

text.description: Text content of a text view. Either an expression, plain text, or templating syntax.

defaultValue.description: Provides a default value for the form field in case no input data exists for the given key.

action.description: A button can either trigger a submit or a reset action. Defaults to submit.

source.description: Specifies the image source via expression or static value (hyperlink or data URI).

alt.description: Provides an alternative text to the image in case it cannot be displayed.

url.description: Enter a URL to an external source.

subtype.description: Selects the type of the datetime component. This can either be date, time, or datetime. Defaults to date.

dateLabel.description: Label displayed beside the date input field.

timeLabel.description: Label displayed beside the time input field.

timeSerializingFormat.description: Defines the time data format. This can either be utc_offset, utc_normalized, or no_timezone.

timeInterval.description: Defines the steps of time that can be selected in the time input field.

disallowPassedDates.description: Enables the restriction to not allow past dates.

increment.description: Defines the increment between valid field value.

decimalDigits.description: Defines the maximum number of digits after the decimal..

serializeToString.description: Configures the output format of the value. This enables unlimited precision digits.

searchable.description: Allows the select entries to be searched via keyboard.

valuesKey.description: Form fields can be configured with an options source defining the individual choices the select provides.

valuesExpression.description: Form fields can be configured with a FEEL expression defining the individual choices the select provides.

height.description: The height of a form component.

path.description: Assigns a path that maps form field children into a data object. Can be a dot separated path.

verticalAlignment.description: Sets the alignment of the form field children. This can either be start, center, or end. Defaults to start.

isRepeating.description: Defines whether the list should currently be repeating its children.

allowAddRemove.description: Allow adding and removing items from a list.

defaultRepetitions.description: Default number of repetitions a dynamic list will render with, if no data is provided. Defaults to 1.

disableCollapse.description: Disable the ability of a list can be collapsed.

nonCollapsedItems.description: Number of items that will be rendered when a list is collapsed. Defaults to 5.

columnsExpression.description: Table columns can be configured with a FEEL expression defining the individual columns the table will render.

rowCount.description: Define the amount of rows a table will render.

dataSource.description: Specifies the data source which will populate the table component.

content.description: The content of a custom component.
